info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Polk County through 915 AM CDT... At 845 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hatfield, or 13 miles southwest of Mena, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wickes... Grannis... Hatfield... Vandervoort... Cossatot River State Park... Shady... Hartley... Mccauley... Cove... Hatton... Camp Pioneer... Bogg Springs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
